unknown_responses.rationale: Reports a percentage fatality rate ('56 percent... were fatal') using a standard verb ('were fatal').
Reports an action and an event, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
Reports number of cases ('nearly 900 people') and characteristics using standard verbs ('infected', 'have been').
Reports number of cases ('at least three') using a standard verb ('have been').
Reports number of workers ('Two of the workers') and outcome using a standard verb ('developed').
Reports a specific event, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
Reports numbers of animals ('three healthy ferrets', 'three of the sick animals', 'all of them') and outcome using standard verbs ('placed', 'became ill').
Contains explicit low-risk framing ('number of human infections has apparently been low').
Reports lack of action, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
Reports status, concerns, and weather forecast, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
Speculative statement about cause, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
Speculative statement about outcome, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
General statement about viral capability, not prices or numerical metrics using standard verbs.
